definition: To transfer possession of something, typically in exchange for payment or as a form of distribution. It is commonly used when referring to giving out or dispensing items, such as money, tickets, or documents.

examples.german: Ich gebe mein Geld f端r Kleidung aus.
examples.english: I spend my money on clothes.

examples.german: Sie gibt viel Zeit f端r ihre Hobbys aus.
examples.english: She spends a lot of time on her hobbies.

examples.german: Er gibt sein Wissen gerne weiter.
examples.english: He likes to share his knowledge.

examples.german: Wir geben zu viel Geld f端r Essen aus.
examples.english: We spend too much money on food.

examples.german: Die Firma gibt viel Geld f端r Werbung aus.
examples.english: The company spends a lot of money on advertising.
